item.title: Sheepy: A Short Adventure
item.description:
Funny how some things find their way back to you like a boomerang, or maybe just a fresh breeze. Thatâ€™s how MrSuicideSheep came back to me, this time with their new game Sheepy: A Short Adventure.

I first knew them as music promoters (probably?) on YouTube about 14 years ago. And now, here they are again, with a short but magical little game. Donâ€™t expect anything groundbreaking, but the atmosphere, the flow, and the mix of audio-visual vibes with curious motifs completely charmed me.

I just had to jot it down here on the blog. If you want to give it a chance, the gameâ€™s free on Steam.

Link is here: ðŸ”— Sheepy_A_Short_Adventure
